name: Carranca
description:
Colab: @osurubim @flekele_

Carrancas são imagens feitas de madeira que surgiram no Brasil ainda no séc XIX. Esses artefatos eram utilizados na proa embarcações do Rio São Franscisco, um dos principais cursos d’água brasileiros. Acredita-se que eram responsáveis por afugentar os maus-espíritos que dificultariam as viagens.

Hoje, as carrancas são exus e artes, que estão nas portas das casas e nas telas dos computadores, afugentando as bad trips.

Carranca é NFT

Video MP4. Trilha Sonora Original feita online pelos artistas. Apito do vapor VST, hackeado.  Fotografias de revista da década de 70.


Carrancas are images wood made that emerged in Brazil in the 19th century. These artifacts were used on the bow of vessels on the São Francisco River, one of the main Brazilian waterways. It is believed that they were responsible for driving away the evil spirits that would make travel difficult. 

Today, the Carrancas are exus and arts, which are on the house doors and on the computer screens, driving away the bad trips.

Video MP4. Original Soundtrack made online by the artists. VST steam whistle, hacked. Magazine photographs from the 70s.
